overview: The university exercise film and a rare portrait of Soviet underground subculture in its variety. There are hippies, metallists, Bulgakov house squatters, footage from illegal art festival Love Street organised by Sergei Solmi. Featuring performances by Moscow alternative bands such as "Звуки Му", "Николай Коперник" and "Облачный край".
title: You Only Have To Draw The Bow Back
